books.title: Harry Potter
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The magical journey of a young wizard at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

books.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
books.author: C.S. Lewis
books.description: A magical land beyond the wardrobe where a great lion battles an evil witch.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An unexpected journey of a hobbit who discovers courage and friendship.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A young hobbit inherits a powerful and evil ring, leading to a quest to destroy it.

books.title: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.description: A scientist creates a sentient being in an unorthodox experiment, leading to tragedy.

books.title: Percy Jackson & The Olympians: The Lightning Thief
books.author: Rick Riordan
books.description: A modern-day boy discovers he is the son of a Greek god and embarks on a quest.

books.title: Dracula
books.author: Bram Stoker
books.description: The terrifying story of Count Dracula and his attempt to move from Transylvania to England.

books.title: A Study in Scarlet (Sherlock Holmes)
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: The first appearance of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson solving a puzzling murder.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A tale of political intrigue, ecology, and religion on a desert planet.

books.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
books.author: Jeff Kinney
books.description: The illustrated journal of middle school student Greg Heffley.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: In a dystopian future, teens are forced to fight to the death in a televised annual event.
